Layout.title: Invest for the environment
Layout.subtitle-1: We protect trees from being cut down and conserve

Services.title: SERVICES
Services.text: Native forests are one of the main producers of oxygen, they are essential for us and all living beings on the planet. For this reason, we must protect native territories from being deforested.
Services.service-card-1-text: Know your environmental impact. Use the calculator and find out your CO2 emissions.
Services.service-card-2-title: Compensate 1 OM = 1 m2 of native forest
Services.service-card-2-text: Your purchase guarantees the protection of the forest. Save trees from being cut down and wildlife from being displaced.
Services.service-card-3-text: Visualize the number of trees and species saved, and how much CO2 your investment absorbed in a year.

issuedTokens.title: ISSUED TOKENS
issuedTokens.issued-token-1-text: It is a virtual currency that represents a tradable asset or utility. It is stored in a digital wallet and allows the holder to use it for investment or economic purposes.
issuedTokens.issued-token-2-text: This token is a digital certification of 1 m2 of native forest. With your purchase, you are protecting the forest forever.
issuedTokens.issued-token-3-text: Day by day, trees absorb carbon from the atmosphere that we emit as humans. We measure how much carbon your (OM) absorbs and give you this token (OC) as a digital Carbon Offset certification.

homeTokens.progress-title: LET'S BE PART OF THE CHANGE
homeTokens.progress-text: Being transparent is one of the aspects we value most in our company. Through this counter we can see our progress towards a better planet!

videoIntro.title: OUR MANIFESTO
videoIntro.text: We want to change the conventional donation scheme in order to save native forests and open the market for an international valuation of native forest land!

phrase.text: The climate crisis is caused by us and the solutions must come from us. We have the tools: technology is on our side

Blog.title: Community
Blog.subtitle: Discover the latest news, insights, and stories about environmental conservation and our mission to protect native forests.
Blog.aboutText: We share insights about forest conservation, carbon credits, and environmental initiatives. Stay updated with our latest projects and achievements.

AboutUs.title: This is Oxygen.
AboutUs.mision-text: Preserve the nature & endangered species that live between it, Help in the economic development of local communities and achieve and international valuation of native forest.
AboutUs.vision-text: Following ONU's sustainability goals we want every company & person in the world to shout out loud: Go Green. The change is possible but we need to act now! Follow us in this adventure.
AboutUs.joinus-title: JOIN OXYGEN TO BE PART OF THE CHANGE!

Project.map-title-2: MEET THE AREAS WE ARE PRESERVING
Project.laFlorencia-text: La Florencia is divided into two estancias, the eastern and western parts. Together they cover an area of about 90,000 hectares in which we find forest environments, wetlands, sandy areas, among others. It is worth mentioning the confirmed presence of the yaguarete, the yurumi or anteater, the collared peccary and many other species of animals and plants. It is a key territory for the survival of the yaguarete (there are between 200 and 250 left in the wild and only 20 in the Gran Chaco of Argentina). It stands out for its proximity to the Impenetrable National Park, acting as a biological corridor between it and the province of Salta.
Project.map-with-markers-description: Click on the points of interest to view the videos

Buy.title: Start to make the change
Buy.buy-now-title-2: INVEST IN THE FUTURE OF THE PLANET
Buy.token-alert-text: By purchasing a token you protect an area of the forest with all the flora and fauna that live in it.

Team.text-dante: Business economist specialized in blockchain management. In crypto since 2015.
Team.text-matteo: Bachelor's degree student in Environmental Management. +10 years of experience in native forest conservation projects
Team.text-franco: Founder of Software & Marketing agency BlackBeaver. Founder of Digital Media Finguru.
Team.text-emiliano: Ex Vice-President of Argentine National park service. CEO of Banco de Bosques: NGO with more than 150.000 hectareas saved. Greenpeace advisor.
Team.text-gustavo: BID bank tokenomics & climate change advisor. Strategic director of Chronos: B2B crypto wallet.
Team.text-guido: Full stack Dev +10 years exp. Founder of Edeon Labs (sofware factory)
Team.text-constanza: Frontend Dev +2 years exp. Background in Chemical Engineering and Biotech.
Team.text-nicolas: +3 years of experience. Fullstack Web Developer. Bachelor in Computer Science
Team.text-lautaro: I have been part of Youth for Climate for 5 years and received the Amnesty Award 2019 for impact in the climate fight.
Team.text-agustina: Freelance manager for 4 years, Biological Sciences student at the University of Buenos Aires.
Team.text-salvador: Bachelor's degree in Social Communication from the University of Buenos Aires, specializing in Institutional Communication.
Team.text-malena: Graphic, industrial and audio-visual designer. 2+ years exp.
Team.text-rosa: Leader of a Wichi native community in Formosa, Argentina. Forest protection advocate.
Team.text-hector: Cacique (chief) of a Wichí native community in El Mistolar, Argentina.

CollaborationBanner.title: Lumen × Oxygen Collaboration
CollaborationBanner.description: Thanks to your affiliate code, you have exclusive access to special benefits

AffiliateSuccessBanner.headline: By going to the party and registering, you now have 5.0 OM tokens in your account.
AffiliateSuccessBanner.explanation: Each OM represents 1 m² of real protected forest in La Florencia, Formosa. It's your little piece of Nature. Literally. That forest absorbs CO₂ and generates carbon credits (OC tokens). Over time, you will accumulate OC that you can exchange for USDT (digital dollars).
AffiliateSuccessBanner.summary: In summary: you danced, you saved forest, and you started to earn.
AffiliateSuccessBanner.cta: Follow the tour through your Dashboard

WelcomeModal.title: Welcome to Oxygen!
WelcomeModal.description1: Welcome to our carbon compensation platform. Here you can directly contribute to forest protection and CO₂ emission reduction.
WelcomeModal.description2: Explore our verified forest projects, calculate your carbon footprint, and participate in the generation of certified carbon credits.
WelcomeModal.description3: Every action you take here has a real impact on environmental conservation.

AffiliateRewardModal.title: Affiliate code activated!
AffiliateRewardModal.description1: Thanks to your affiliate code, you have received 5 OM tokens as a reward. Each OM represents 1 m² of protected forest in La Florencia, Formosa.
AffiliateRewardModal.description2: These tokens generate carbon credits (OC) that you can exchange for USDT (digital dollars) as the forest absorbs CO₂.
AffiliateRewardModal.description3: You have started your journey towards sustainability and earnings!

Calculator.title: Carbon Footprint Calculator
Calculator.subtitle: Calculate your environmental impact and discover how many carbon credits you need
Calculator.description: Answer a few simple questions and learn your annual carbon footprint in tonnes of CO₂e
Calculator.howToCompensate: How do you want to offset?
Calculator.calculateDescription: Daily activities like using electricity, driving a car, etc. generate greenhouse gas emissions that are harmful to the environment.
Calculator.bankDescription:
It is a foundation that channels contributions from small, medium and large donors to intervene in the real estate market of lands to save the last native forests remaining in Argentina.

The objective is to prevent them from being cleared to save all forest inhabitants and enhance their sustainable use for local communities.
